ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 473
ExpProperties.EpDescription: When enabled, the methodology shall fail when any expected traffic stream has a dropped frame count greater than 0. When disabled, dropped frame count is ignored.

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 451
ExpProperties.EpDescription: Specify the duration in seconds to run protocols and send traffic

ExpProperties.EpDescription: Specify the HTTP load in kbps. The load shall be sent for the test duration with no ramp time

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 188
ExpProperties.EpDescription: Specify if traffic should be created and sent for the default route policies. The default policies typically match everything and have a priority of 65535

sql_statement.static: SELECT * FROM PoliciesEastToWest UNION ALL SELECT * FROM PoliciesWestToEast

Children.Name: PDC: Combine Traffic with Policy Tables

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: PDC: Combine Traffic with Policy Tables

sql_statement.static: SELECT AllPolicies.SbName, Fact_Rx_Tx.Tx_FrameCount, Fact_Rx_Tx.Rx_FrameCount, Fact_Rx_Tx.Rx_DroppedFrameCount, AllPolicies.ExpectedRx FROM AllPolicies INNER JOIN Fact_Rx_Tx ON Fact_Rx_Tx.Tx_StreamBlockName = AllPolicies.SbName

SELECT HttpResults.Name AS 'Name', HttpResults.AttemptedTransactions AS 'AttemptedTransactions', HttpResults.SuccessfulTransactions AS 'SuccessfulTransactions', HttpResults.UnsuccessfulTransactions AS 'UnsuccessfulTransactions', HttpResults.AbortedTransactions AS 'AbortedTransactions', PoliciesWestToEast.ExpectedRx AS 'ExpectedRx' FROM HttpResults INNER JOIN PoliciesWestToEast ON HttpResults.Name = PoliciesWestToEast.SbName GROUP BY HttpResults.Name UNION SELECT HttpResults.Name AS 'Name', HttpResults.AttemptedTransactions AS 'AttemptedTransactions', HttpResults.SuccessfulTransactions AS 'SuccessfulTransactions', HttpResults.UnsuccessfulTransactions AS 'UnsuccessfulTransactions', HttpResults.AbortedTransactions AS 'AbortedTransactions', PoliciesEastToWest.ExpectedRx AS 'ExpectedRx' FROM HttpResults INNER JOIN PoliciesEastToWest ON HttpResults.Name = PoliciesEastToWest.SbName GROUP BY HttpResults.Name

Children.Name: PDC: Create Report Table and Set Verdict

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: PDC: Create Report Table and Set Verdict

sql_statement.static: SELECT SbName AS 'Stream Name', Tx_FrameCount AS 'Tx Frame Count', Rx_FrameCount AS 'Rx Frame Count', Rx_DroppedFrameCount AS 'Dropped Frame Count', ExpectedRx AS 'Expected on Rx Port', PassFail AS 'Pass or Fail' FROM PoliciesTxRxVerdict
SELECT COUNT(*) = 0 FROM PoliciesTxRxVerdict WHERE PoliciesTxRxVerdict.PassFail = 'FAIL'

table_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: All expected traffic streams received. When Expected Rx is True, Rx Frame Count > 0 is considered a Pass.
table_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: One or more traffic streams failed to meet the expected condition. When Expected Rx is True, Rx Frame Count must be > 0.

sql_statement.static: SELECT Name AS 'Name', AttemptedTransactions AS 'Attempted Transactions', SuccessfulTransactions AS 'Successful Transactions', UnsuccessfulTransactions AS 'Unsuccessful Transactions', AbortedTransactions AS 'Aborted Transactions', ExpectedRx AS 'Expected on Rx Port', PassFail AS 'Pass or Fail' FROM HttpResultsVerdict
SELECT COUNT(*) = 0 FROM HttpResultsVerdict WHERE HttpResultsVerdict.PassFail = 'FAIL'

table_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: All HTTP clients met the expected conditions. When Expected Rx is True, Successful Tranactions must be > 0. When Expected Rx is False, Successful Transactions must be 0.
table_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: One or more HTTP clients failed to meet the expected conditions. When Expected Rx is True, Successful Tranactions must be > 0. When Expected Rx is False, Successful Transactions must be 0.

sql_statement.static: SELECT SbName AS 'Stream Name', Tx_FrameCount AS 'Tx Frame Count', Rx_FrameCount AS 'Rx Frame Count', Rx_DroppedFrameCount AS 'Dropped Frame Count' FROM PoliciesTxRxVerdict WHERE ExpectedRx = 'True' AND Rx_DroppedFrameCount > 0
SELECT COUNT(*) = 0  FROM PoliciesTxRxVerdict WHERE ExpectedRx = 'True' AND Rx_DroppedFrameCount > 0

table_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: All expected traffic streams had no dropped frames.
table_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: At least one expected traffic stream had dropped frames.
